code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{AppBar,Toolbar,Typography}from'@mui/material';import{useWeb3React}from'@web3-react/core';import{TESTNET}from"constants/contractAddress";import ConnectButton from'./ConnectButton';import WalletConnectDialog from'./WalletConnectDialog';import{injectedConnector}from'../connectors/injectedConnector';import Swap from'../images/logos/swappirate.png';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Header=()=>{const[walletDialogOpen,setWalletDialogOpen]=useState(false);const{account,activate,deactivate}=useWeb3React();const handleClickConnect=()=>{if(account){deactivate();}else{setWalletDialogOpen(true);}};const handleConfirm=async()=>{await activate(injectedConnector);setWalletDialogOpen(false);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(AppBar,{position:"absolute",color:"default",elevation:0,sx:{position:'relative',borderBottom:t=>"1px solid ".concat(t.palette.divider)},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Toolbar,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{width:"80px",alt:"logo",style:{cursor:"pointer"},src:Swap}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Typography,{variant:"h6",color:"inherit",noWrap:true,sx:{flexGrow:1,marginLeft:'20px'},children:["(","".concat((TESTNET?"Verus Testnet":"Verus").toUpperCase()," NATI swap service"),")"]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ConnectButton,{onClick:handleClickConnect}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(WalletConnectDialog,{isOpen:walletDialogOpen,onClose:()=>setWalletDialogOpen(false),onConfirm:handleConfirm})]})});};export default Header;
